# Version Control, {renv}, and Reproducibility

### About Our Speaker

[Sep Dadsetan, Ph.D.](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sepdadsetan/) has combined his expertise in the clinical sciences with his passion for computing to help create software solutions in the healthcare space. He deeply enjoys data exploration and analysis to help make better business decisions, increase efficiency, and to provide greater opportunity to patients.

Sep has expertise in data science and analytics, as well as Real World Data ("RWD") and Real World Evidence ("RWE"). He believes there is significant value in leveraging RWD in many facets of healthcare which will help reduce costs, improve patient access to drugs, devices, and trials, as well as drive deeper collaboration between stakeholders in healthcare. Sep is the Executive Director of RWE Analytics at ConcertAI.
